title: Angus McKie: So Beautifull, So Dangerous
description:
Heavy Metal Presents
52 pages

Angus McKie is a British artist and colorist. He has done illustrations for science-fiction paperbacks in the 1970s and 1980s, as well as Stewart Cowley's 'Terran Trade Authority' books. He has done comics for Pssst! in 1984 ('Power to the People' with Mike Feeney). He worked with Dave Gibbons on 'The Dome Ground Zero' in 1997, a comic drawn completely bye computer. He was also responsible for illustrating one of the segments of the film Heavy Metal. He is the colorist for Dark Horse titles like 'Heart of Empire', 'Martha Washington Saves the World' and 'Star Wars'.
